name: ORDER_RAD_OWNERS
description: ORDER_RAD_OWNERS stores the study owner information for a radiology order performed in radiology

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of owners for an order.

columns.name: OWNER_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: SUP_FOR_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.
